text: if you walk you know down the street and
you see something that is manufactured
it was more likely designed in

line
it's although Burks is everywhere
SolidWorks is a five gig download or a
five gig program that has to be shipped
either on a DVD or download it over the
Internet
and then the users have to take you know
up to three four hours to install it
just to try it and that's a lot of
investment so the challenge we were
facing was how do you get it in the
hands of customers faster and easier
since self-fulfillment of trial software
is the new norm we have met with the AWS
team we sat down with them and talked
about a roadmap of how to start using
app string because once you look at the
cost of app stream it is very favorable
for long term scale we've mapped out a
road map we had some support from a few
of their solution architects and team to
help us get up and up and running
because it was new you know for my team
to implement for the past you know
couple years we've been working with
Amazon App Stream to bring streaming
versions of SolidWorks to the browser to
our customers to try it out for a couple
of days that helps us sort of go into
the sales funnel and help you know sell
the product since we started the program
we've increased our online activity and
online trials exponentially
